column2:
"I hope I can become a first-rate scientist
like Aki someday. I still have a long way to go,
though."

"Aki is an ARKS member and a scientist.
She's the epitome of beauty and talent. ......her personality is a bit troublesome, though. "

"Why do I work with Aki?
Because I look up to her, of course."

"I want to be like her one day, so I'm
learning the ropes at her side.
I just wish she was a little less brusque."

"Aki is always making unreasonable demands
on me. I've had a few near-death experiences......"
"But since you started helping out, life has been so peaceful. I can't thank you enough!"

"You want to know what Aki is researching?
It's hard to explain, because it covers so
many disciplines. In short, she studies life."

"She's well-versed in medical science, too.
It almost seems like an obsession for her.
She has an amazing mind."

"<%me>.
Thank you very much for being so supportive of me. "
"Teacher, I just wanted to be at your side. That is all. "

"And I call myself the assistant of your unstoppable self; this is so pathetic.
If I decide, I move. That was all that was required. "

"First Dark Falz revives, and how these strange things are coming......
What's going on...?"

"First Dark Falz revives, and how these strange things are coming......
What's going on...?"
"Is this really the time to be holding the Battle-Skills Tournament? Should we really be relaxing with Dark Falz out there...?"
"...Well, it's not like me worrying about it will do anything..."

"Sigh.
Ah, it's nothing.
Really, it's nothing."

"What was I doing...you ask?
Uh, I was..."

"......really, I'd like to ask the same thing.
What exactly was I doing? "

"What was I doing...you ask?
Uh, I was..."

"......really, I'd like to ask the same thing.
What exactly was I doing? "

"What was I doing...you ask?
Uh, I was..."

"......really, I'd like to ask the same thing.
What exactly was I doing? "

"I just wanted to be beside you.
That's all."

"First of all, that is the first premise, and from there......
Well, I'll think about that. "

"Oh really, the captain......
Well no, I don't have anything to do with the thin air institution anymore."
"I'm Aki's assistant!"
